summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Money Balancer MVP. All backend APIs and frontend features are working correctly. Backend tests achieved 100% pass rate (22/22 tests). Frontend tests verified all user flows including dashboard, expense tracking, debt management, settings, and warning system.

design_issues.issue: Console warning: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent
design_issues.impact: Accessibility warning only, does not affect functionality

passed_tests: Backend: Create expenses (POST /api/expenses)
Backend: Get expenses with filters - day, week, month (GET /api/expenses)
Backend: Delete expenses (DELETE /api/expenses/{id})
Backend: Create debts (POST /api/debts)
Backend: Get debts (GET /api/debts)
Backend: Update debt status (PATCH /api/debts/{id})
Backend: Delete debts (DELETE /api/debts/{id})
Backend: Create/update spending limits (POST /api/limit)
Backend: Get spending limits (GET /api/limit)
Backend: Get summary with calculations (GET /api/summary)
Backend: Warning system - yellow at 80%, red at 100%
Frontend: Dashboard loads with all 4 stat cards (today, week, month, debts)
Frontend: Weekly bar chart displays correctly
Frontend: Category pie chart displays correctly
Frontend: Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Add Expense, Debts, Settings)
Frontend: Add expense form - all fields work (title, amount, date, category)
Frontend: Category dropdown with 8 categories
Frontend: Form submission and redirect to dashboard
Frontend: Settings page - set weekly and monthly limits
Frontend: Settings persistence
Frontend: Debts page - add debt entry dialog
Frontend: Debts page - both sections (Money I Gave, Money I Owe)
Frontend: Debts page - mark debt as paid
Frontend: Debts page - delete debt entry
Frontend: Warning badges display (red at 100% limit exceeded)
Frontend: Real-time data updates across pages
